content:
/>
V.iii.1.D.2.f
.
Example of Evaluating a Recurrence of Osteomyelitis
Situation
:  Same facts as example shown in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 1.D.2.e
.  In October 1999, the Veteran was again found to have active osteomyelitis with a discharging sinus, without involucrum, sequestrum, or constitutional symptoms.
Result
:  Continue the 20-percent evaluation.  Reevaluation is necessary to remove the future reduction to zero percent and to schedule a future examination to establish the date of inactivity.
Coded Conclusion
:
1. SC (PTE INC)
5000
Osteomyelitis, right tibia, active
20% from 7-21-96
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D - Osteomyelitis
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
